SEARCH
Module simulation.animal_simulation
Package simulation.animal_simulation.animals

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
simulation.animal_simulation.animals.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fox, Rabbit
public abstract class Animal extends Object
The Animal class represents an animal in the simulation. It is an abstract class that is extended by specific animal classes. Each Animal object has a sex, maximum satiety, age, vision range, and a boolean indicating if it is alive. It also keeps track of the nearest shelter, the ground it is currently on, and if it is running to a shelter. The Animal class provides methods for setting and getting its nearest shelter and current ground. It also provides methods for moving the animal, decreasing its satiety, and checking if it is alive. The Animal class is responsible for the animal's movement and actions during the simulation.

      sex - Animal sex.
      maxSatiety - The maximum satiety of the animal.
      visionRange - The vision range of the animal.
      age - The age of the animal.
      stepsBeforeGrow - The number of steps before the animal grows.

    • getNearestGrounds

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<Ground> getNearestGrounds(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<Ground> predicate)
      Get nearest ground (top, right, bottom, left) that meets the passed condition.
      Parameters:
      predicate - The condition that the ground must meet.
      Returns:
      The list of grounds that meets the condition. If no ground meets the condition, an empty list is returned.

    • getGroundsInVisionRange

      protected List<Ground> getGroundsInVisionRange(@NotNull @NotNull Ground sourceGround)
      Returns a list of Ground objects that are within the vision range of the given source ground.
      Parameters:
      sourceGround - The ground from which the vision range is calculated.
      Returns:
      A list of Ground objects within the vision range.

    • getGroundInVisionRangeByConditionSortedByDistance

      protected Ground getGroundInVisionRangeByConditionSortedByDistance(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<Ground> condition)
      Returns a ground in the vision range of the animal that meets the condition and is closest to the animal.
      Parameters:
      condition - The condition that the ground must meet.
      Returns:
      The ground that meets the condition and is closest to the animal.

    • moveToNextGround

      protected void moveToNextGround(Ground nextGround)
      Move the animal to the next ground.

    • tryToLeaveCell

      protected void tryToLeaveCell()
      Moves the animal to another ground. The animal will try to move to the next top ground, then to the next right one, then to the next bottom one, and finally to the next left one.

    • runToShelter

      protected void runToShelter()
      Moves the animal towards the nearest shelter. If the animal entered the ground where the shelter is located, it will try to enter the shelter.

    • moveToGround

      protected boolean moveToGround(Ground ground)
      Try to move the animal to the ground.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground where the animal is moved.
      Returns:
      True if the animal was moved to the ground, false otherwise.

    • moveTowardsGround

      Moves the animal towards the ground.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground animal is moving towards.

      protected boolean moveToNextGroundByCoordinatesDifference(@NotNull @NotNull Coordinates sourceCoordinates, @NotNull @NotNull Coordinates targetCoordinates)
      Moves the animal to the next ground based on the difference between the coordinates of the first and second coordinates.

    • moveInDirection

      protected boolean moveInDirection(@NotNull @NotNull Direction direction)
      Moves the animal in the given direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which the animal is moving.
      Returns:
      True if the animal was moved in the direction, false otherwise.

      protected boolean moveTowardsShelter()
      Moves the animal towards the shelter.
      Returns:
      True if the animal was moved towards the shelter, false otherwise.

    • moveAwayFromShelter

      protected boolean moveAwayFromShelter()
      Moves the animal away from the shelter.
      Returns:
      True if the animal was moved away from the shelter, false otherwise.

    • tryToDecreaseSatiety

      protected void tryToDecreaseSatiety()
      The method that should be called when the animal is doing a step. It checks if the animal made enough steps to decrease its satiety. If it did, the satiety is decreased.

    • tryToGrow

      protected void tryToGrow()
      The method that should be called when the animal is doing a step. It checks if the animal made enough steps to grow. If it did, the animal grows.

    • tryToDecompose

      public void tryToDecompose(Function<Animal,Boolean> onRemoveAnimalFromMap)
      Try to remove the dead animal from the ground if it has been dead for 20 steps after its death.
      Parameters:
      onRemoveAnimalFromMap - The function that removes the animal from the map's list of animals.
